subject: Update openssl.spec file to use %{_prefix}/bin/* instead of %{_prefix}/bin Fix for TIVI-659
commitMessage:
Update openssl.spec file to use %{_prefix}/bin/* instead of %{_prefix}/bin
Fix for TIVI-659

Change-Id: Id68dff22738dce31cb7499df64e89787d3b39993
Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Van Cutsem <geoffroy.vancutsem@intel.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

rpmlint checked packaging/openssl.spec: 1 errors, 2 warnings.
- W: non-standard-group System/Libraries
- line 43: W: rpm-buildroot-usage %build --prefix=%{_prefix} --install-prefix=$RPM_BUILD_ROOT linux-generic32 -ldl -no-asm
- line 55: E: hardcoded-library-path in %{buildroot}/usr/lib/*.a

Patch Set 1:

[BUILD CHECK RESULT] This change is built against OBS project Tizen:Devel:Main: 

 repository     arch           result         

 standard       i586           succeeded      

 standard       armv7el        succeeded
Patch Set 1: Verified; Looks good to me, approved
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
